detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract CandyToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CandyToken.sol#87-209) has payable functions:
	 - CandyToken.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CandyToken.sol#197-199)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether or the call value is 0
